mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_name, login_name, password, salt, enabled, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{edition,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_by = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edition = #{edition,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, login_name, password, salt, enabled, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_name, login_name, password, salt, enabled, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_user

select t_user.id, user_name, login_name, password, salt, enabled, t_user.create_by, t_user.create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_user,t_user_role WHERE t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id AND t_user_role.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_name, login_name, password, salt, enabled, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, edition from t_user WHERE login_name like #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
